ygData.subject: RE: thunder staff (SPOILER)
ygData.msgSnippet: thanx....I dont know....it sounds kinda of weak then....kind of like the 2h-blunt to me.  Not only are you giving up a ton of possible wis, but your getting a
ygData.messageBody:
thanx....I dont know....it sounds kinda of weak then....kind of like the
2h-blunt to me. Not only are you giving up a ton of possible wis, but your
getting a VERY slow attack method. I'm sorry....maybe a 1h warhammer, or
something like a throwing hammer which returns....that'd be nice. Give
clerics a chance to throw a DISTANCE weapon. It wouldnt be hard to do,
normal 3d rpgs do it all the time. *sigh*

-----Original Message-----
From: Deane, Ben [mailto:BDeane@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 9:41 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] thunder staff (SPOILER)


From: "Deane, Ben" <BDeane@...>

I have not seen one first hand, but this is what I've heard:
It's called the Thunder Staff because it comes from the Temple of Thunder in
Qeynos. There is no spell effect. And it is an alternative reward (don't
know how rare or otherwise) for the quest that involves killing Drosco, a
zombie in the Qeynos sewers.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ralph Carothers [mailto:CarothersR@...]



ok, so where does one find this then? and why is it called thunder staff?
is there a spell effect?
